about_the_game:
Jump & Run Action in Egypt!


Moorhuhn follows 30 clay tablets to the grave of TUT EGG KHAMUN!

Egypt – mystical land at the Nile full of traditions … and not unfamiliar territory for Moorhuhn. Deep within his burial chamber, the magnificent sarcophagus of TUT EGG KHAMUN is waiting to be found!

Moorhuhn Jump and Run 'Traps and Treasures 3' brings 31 challenging levels full of dangerous traps, sneaky enemies and hidden treasures …

FEATURES:
  • 31 levels full of Jump & Run action
  • Follow the 30 clay tablets to TUT EGG KHAMUN!
  • Challenging opponents and collectible treasures

At the end of each level, you can see the number of coins, statues, and artifacts you have collected, the number of defeated opponents and the points you have earned. You can compete with other players in the online ranking (internet connection required).

You can replay unlocked levels at any time to improve your final score.

Enough talk. Get the game now and jump into the adventure!

Jump & Run Action in Egypt!


Moorhuhn follows 30 clay tablets to the grave of TUT EGG KHAMUN!

Egypt – mystical land at the Nile full of traditions … and not unfamiliar territory for Moorhuhn. Deep within his burial chamber, the magnificent sarcophagus of TUT EGG KHAMUN is waiting to be found!

Moorhuhn Jump and Run 'Traps and Treasures 3' brings 31 challenging levels full of dangerous traps, sneaky enemies and hidden treasures …

FEATURES:
  • 31 levels full of Jump & Run action
  • Follow the 30 clay tablets to TUT EGG KHAMUN!
  • Challenging opponents and collectible treasures

At the end of each level, you can see the number of coins, statues, and artifacts you have collected, the number of defeated opponents and the points you have earned. You can compete with other players in the online ranking (internet connection required).

You can replay unlocked levels at any time to improve your final score.

Enough talk. Get the game now and jump into the adventure!
